news.title: xAI lays out interplanetary ambitions in public all-hands

news.title: OpenAI disbands mission alignment team
news.summary: The team's leader has been given a new role as OpenAI's chief futurist, while the other team members have been reassigned throughout the company.

news.title: Apple’s Siri revamp reportedly delayed… again
news.summary: While the new Siri was expected to launch with the upcoming iOS 26.4 update in March, now, the changes are expected to roll out more slowly over time, reportedly postponing some features until the May iOS update, or even until the release of iOS 27 in September.

news.title: Uber Eats launches AI assistant to help with grocery cart creation
news.summary: Uber Eats launched a new AI feature, “Cart Assistant,” that can automatically add items to your cart based on text or image prompts.

news.title: I Tried RentAHuman, Where AI Agents Hired Me to Hype Their AI Startups
